title: By the Quene The Quenes Maiestie certaynely vnderstandyng that the Frenche kyng hath the sixt of this present moneth caused to be published in Fraunce by sounde of trompet in this sorte, that all maner his subiectes of what estate soeuer they be, shoulde arme and equippe all maner of vesselles at theyr pleasure, ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: In Powles Churchyarde by Rycharde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Quenes Maiestie,
notes: At foot of title: Cum priuilegio Regiae Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
